article.author: AmaWaterways
article.title: Cruise the Rhine with AmaWaterways
article.lead: Cruise the beautiful Rhine river with AmaWaterways. Discover a wealth of stunning scenery, rich history and culture. Create memories to last a lifetime.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UVIHbA9mklA?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Holland America Line
article.title: Our Europe is your Europe
article.lead: Immerse yourself in the fascinating past and breathtaking natural beauty of Northern Europe or explore the Mediterranean’s seaside cities before sitting down together for an unforgettable meal.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SVGlXO3Wt_8?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Princess Cruises
article.title: The Rhythm of Mexico Awaits | Find it with Princess Cruises
article.lead: Hear the rhythm of mariachis, indulge in tangy margaritas and explore the picturesque landscape.
article.body: Visit historic sites, sit back on one of the picture-perfect beaches and stop to savor the spicy and inventive cuisine. Whether you’re seeking a romantic escape or a fun family vacation, a cruise along the colorful Mexican Riviera will fill you with the spirit of fiesta. The 2020-2021 Mexico season is here!
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/akDgiM9IVPQ?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>
